attributes.action: Give the taxpayer a break! By not increasing current taxes and not introducing new stealth taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The taxpaying workers of this country work or have worked hard for their income, it's time to give us a chance to enjoy some of our money before the chancellery stick their hands in our pockets again.

All we ask is a year of stability, this can simply be achieved by leaving the current tax system as is (of course, any favourable changes would be welcome) and resisting the urge to introduce new stealth taxes such as charging by weight for waste disposal (most of us already pay a healthy amount to our councils each year).
